Title: L'attesa
Writer: Giacomo Bendotti, Ilaria Macchia, Andrea Paolo Massara, Piero Messina, Luigi Pirandello (play)
Actors: Juliette Binoche, Lou de Laâge, Giorgio Colangeli, Domenico Diele
Plot: A mother unexpectedly meets her son's fiancée at a villa in Sicily and gets to know her as she waits for her son to arrive.
